TRANSLATE_SENT_MESSAGES_NOTE: Whether or not to translate messages you send.
TRANSLATE_RECEIVED_MESSAGES_NOTE: Whether or not to translate messages you receive automagically. This only works in the current channel.
TRANSLATION_ENGINE_NOTE: The translation engine you want to use.
YOUR_LANGUAGE_NOTE: The language you speak. Incoming messages will be translated to this language.
TARGET_LANGUAGE_NOTE: The language you wish you could speak. Outgoing messages will be translated to this language.
